radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Transformed into lentigo maligna melanoma in 1995

radiographic_examinations.findings: 1995: Lentigo maligna with possible early invasion; 2000: Lentigo maligna arising in a seborrheic keratosis
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: 1995 showed early invasion; 2000 there was re-excision confirming diagnosis of LM
